stretching.title: Stretching
stretching.description: Improve your flexibility and prevent injuries with these stretches
instructions: Follow the stretching poses shown on screen
Hold each stretch for 15-20 seconds
Remember to breathe deeply and relax into each stretch

pushups.title: Push-ups
pushups.description: Build upper body strength with this classic exercise
instructions: Position your hands shoulder-width apart
Keep your body in a straight line
Lower yourself and push back up

jumpingjacks.title: Jumping Jacks
jumpingjacks.description: A fun aerobic exercise to get your heart pumping
instructions: Stand with feet together and arms at your sides
Jump while spreading legs and raising arms
Jump back to starting position

plank.title: Plank
plank.description: Build core strength and stability with this simple but effective exercise
instructions: Start in a push-up position with arms straight and hands directly under shoulders
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
Engage your core muscles by pulling your belly button toward your spine
Look at a spot on the floor to keep your neck neutral
Hold the position for 20-30 seconds, gradually working up to longer times

resistance.title: Resistance Band Workout
resistance.description: Use resistance bands for a full-body workout
instructions: Secure the band properly before starting
Perform exercises with controlled movements
Keep tension in the band throughout the exercise

squats.title: Squats
squats.description: Build lower body strength with this fundamental exercise
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower your body as if sitting in a chair
Rise back to starting position

yoga.title: Yoga
yoga.description: Improve flexibility, balance and mindfulness with yoga poses
instructions: Find a quiet space where you can move freely
Start with a simple 'Mountain Pose' - stand tall with feet together, arms at sides
Try 'Tree Pose' - stand on one leg, place other foot on inner thigh
Move to 'Downward Dog' - hands and feet on floor forming an upside-down V
Focus on your breathing throughout the practice

crunches.title: Crunches
crunches.description: Strengthen your core with these abdominal exercises
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent
Engage your core as you lift your shoulders off the ground
Lower back down with control

jumprope.title: Jump Rope
jumprope.description: Improve coordination and cardio with jump rope exercises
instructions: Hold rope handles with a relaxed grip and stand with feet together
Position the rope behind you, then swing it overhead and jump as it reaches your feet
Start with basic jumps using both feet together
Try more advanced moves like alternate feet or double jumps as you improve
Keep a steady rhythm and pace, focusing on consistent jumping height

boxing.title: Boxing
boxing.description: Practice boxing techniques for fitness and coordination
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart in boxing stance
Practice punches with proper form
Remember to protect your face

stepups.title: Step Ups
stepups.description: Simple but effective exercise using a step or platform
instructions: Stand in front of a step or sturdy platform
Step up with one foot, then the other
Step down in the same controlled manner

weightlifting.title: Weightlifting
weightlifting.description: Build strength using weights with proper form and technique
instructions: Start with lightweight dumbbells appropriate for your level
Focus on proper form rather than heavy weights
Perform movements slowly with control

handstands.title: Handstands
handstands.description: Challenge yourself with this advanced bodyweight skill
instructions: Start against a wall for support
Kick up gently with control
Hold position focusing on alignment
